bibl.title: Excavations at the Hill of Agios Georgios (PA.SY.D.Y.), Nicosia : 2002 Season - Preliminary Report. - Appendix: The Pottery of the Early and Middle Hellenistic Period (by Andrea BERLIN and Jeffery PILACINSKI). Avec résumés en anglais et en grec.
bibl.note: See pp. 184; - 186, pl. 1, 1: rectangular stone (not in its original position) revealing the inscription: ÉArsinÒhw Filad°lfou. <Arsinoes Philadelphou>
